description:
Cigarettes: Taxed quantity

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73411 Tobacco tax statistics

Definition:
Cigarettes are products subject to excise duties, in this
case tobacco tax.
Cigarettes are
- rolls of tobacco capable of being smoked as they are and
which are not cigars or cigarillos as described above,
- rolls of tobacco which, by simple non-industrial handling,
are inserted into cigarette-paper tubes, or
- rolls of tobacco which, by simple non-industrial handling,
are wrapped in cigarette paper.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Cigarettes: Taxed quantity
